title: Research Paper QA Speech Retrieval Model
subHeadingDesc: This project is completly Opensource and bulding using Ollama, Llama2, Langchain and other Speech Models
description: Welcome to the Research Paper QA Model repository! This project aims to develop a powerful Question Answering (QA) model specifically tailored for research papers. With the integration of open-source tools such as Ollama, LangChain, Transformers, and more Opensource Models, we're crafting a solution that simplifies the understanding of complex research literature.
